001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.config;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.utilities.config.ConfigSource;
004import io.cyborgcode.utilities.config.PropertyConfig;
005import org.aeonbits.owner.Config;
006
007/**
008 * Configuration interface for database connection settings.
009 *
010 * <p>This interface uses the OWNER library to load database configuration properties
011 * from system properties or a specified configuration file.
012 *
013 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
014 */
015@ConfigSource("db-config")
016@Config.LoadPolicy(Config.LoadType.MERGE)
017@Config.Sources({"system:properties", "classpath:${db.config.file}.properties"})
018public interface DbConfig extends PropertyConfig {
019
020   /**
021    * Retrieves the base Java package for your project.
022    *
023    * <p>Used by reflection utilities to scan for entity classes and database hooks
024    * under the specified root package.
025    *
026    * @return the root package name of the application code
027    */
028   @Key("project.packages")
029   @Separator(";")
030   String[] projectPackages();
031
032   /**
033    * Retrieves the default database type.
034    *
035    * <p>Determines which {@code DbType} implementation (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL)
036    * is used to configure connections and dialect behavior.
037    *
038    * @return the configured {@code DbType} for the default database
039    */
040   @SuppressWarnings("squid:S1452")
041   @ConverterClass(DbTypeConverter.class)
042   @Key("db.default.type")
043   DbType<?> type();
044
045   /**
046    * Retrieves the default database host.
047    *
048    * @return The hostname or IP address of the database.
049    */
050   @Key("db.default.host")
051   String host();
052
053   /**
054    * Retrieves the default database port.
055    *
056    * @return The port number used for database connections.
057    */
058   @Key("db.default.port")
059   Integer port();
060
061   /**
062    * Retrieves the default database name.
063    *
064    * @return The name of the database.
065    */
066   @Key("db.default.name")
067   String name();
068
069   /**
070    * Retrieves the default database username.
071    *
072    * @return The username used for authentication.
073    */
074   @Key("db.default.username")
075   String username();
076
077   /**
078    * Retrieves the default database password.
079    *
080    * @return The password used for authentication.
081    */
082   @Key("db.default.password")
083   String password();
084
085   /**
086    * Retrieves the full JDBC connection string for the database.
087    *
088    * <p>If provided, this URL will be used directly to establish connections,
089    * overriding the individual host, port, and name properties.
090    *
091    * @return the complete JDBC URL, or {@code null} if not set
092    */
093   @Key("db.full.connection.string")
094   String fullConnectionString();
095
096}
